headline: How to play furniture stocks: RH, Wayfair, William Sonoma
summary: Furniture stocks are under pressure with President Trump threatening tariffs on imports. UBS US hardline and broad line and food retail analyst Michael Lasser joins Market Domination to discuss how to play furniture stocks, including names like Wayfair (W), RH (RH), and William Sonoma (WSM) To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.

headline: Earnings Season Highlights on Tariffs, Consumer Spending, and More
summary: Back-to-school spending is strong, and other revelations from RBC’s reading of S&P 500 earnings-call transcripts. Plus, investment newsletter commentary on interest rates, agriculture, and healthcare stocks.

headline: Jim Cramer Discusses RH and the Challenges of Reviving American Furniture
summary: RH (NYSE:RH) is one of the stocks that Jim Cramer shared insight on. Cramer was of the opinion that, despite the administration’s attempts to bring back the furniture industry, it might not lead to fruitful results. headline: What the Stock Market Learned About Earnings and Consumers This Summer
summary: Although  Nvidia’s  surging earnings didn’t satisfy investors this week, stocks have been scoring record highs even as worries about trade, the Federal Reserve, and consumer health persist.  In her roundup of the season, she notes that recent corporate earnings reports have painted a fairly reassuring picture of consumer spending, even amid concerns about tariff-related price increases.
